name: Element Tower
description:
Made for Godot Wild Jam #25. My first released Godot game!

A meteor is fast approaching. You, the chosen one, have no choice but to absorb the elements in the Tower of Fate, and use those powers to change the world.

... Or at least that's the story behind the game, didn't really have time to add cutscenes or anything.

This game is a puzzle platformer, where you obtain the power of the elements to solve short puzzles and get to the top. It's not very long, but I hope you enjoy it.

Wildcards used:

  • Traditionalist 
  • HUD-less (only kind of... there's still dialogue boxes and such)

Controls:

  • Direction arrow keys for movement
  • Space key to jump
  • Z to switch elements
  • X to use elements
  • C to examine certain objects
